input_text:
Job Title: Zenoss Monitoring Engineer

Location: Columbus, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description 

 Monitoring engineer – Zenoss and Python are must have skills Other monitoring tools – SolarWinds, New Relic, Datadog, Dynatrace, HP OpenView, etc. is great to have – infra monitoring tools Think about where we are going – python and scripting is important because of automation JavaScript, Ansible, PowerShell, RunDeck – great to have Newer monitoring technologies – OpenTelemetry, Grafana, Event Streams – nice to have as well as those could be where we go next We will be looking to modernize eventually Ideally it would be experience with Zenoss cloud, but if they only have Zenoss on Prem or core that is fine Should have version 6 or higher This role is primarily to work with Zenoss, but it interacts with ServiceNow event management, someone who understands ServiceNow, for app monitoring we use Dynatrace Because we have been doing migration for months we have a backlog of onboarding new systems, change how we do monitoring on some of our infra, manually or they can script that Be able to talk to the Zenoss API


 Job Description 

Our client has an established enterprise practice and is looking for an experienced engineer.

The team is responsible for enterprise infrastructure monitoring.

 Selected Candidate Will Help 

 Design, build and manage enterprise monitoring solutions from various vendors Design, build and manage tool integrations with ServiceNow and other tools. Write, document, and maintain Python scripts to perform API calls and other essential tasks. Work directly with platform engineers, infrastructure owners, architecture, and management to understand requirements and develop solutions to meet those requirements


 Must Have 

 5 years experience in installing, configuring and supporting monitoring solutions on an enterprise scale Strong understanding of large-scale applications, network architectures, micro-service architecture, monitoring and fault management Strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills Experience with Zenoss, Solarwinds, Openview, or other enterprise monitoring solutions Python programming experience Demonstrated ability to work remotely. Excellent communication skills


 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Zenoss Monitoring Engineer
job_responsibilities: Design, build and manage enterprise monitoring solutions from various vendors
Design, build and manage tool integrations with ServiceNow and other tools
Write, document, and maintain Python scripts to perform API calls and other essential tasks
Work directly with platform engineers, infrastructure owners, architecture, and management to understand requirements and develop solutions to meet those requirements
